title: OT58: Opepipen Thread
summary:
Key ideas:
- This is a bi-weekly visible open thread for discussions.
- There are hidden threads every few days for specific topics.
- The post includes highlights from previous comments of the week.
- A link to a Marginal Revolution post is shared.

Key learnings:
- This post is a forum for readers to discuss any topic they want.
- Katja Grace, dtsund, grendelkhan, Emirikol, and Corey posted noteworthy comments previously.
- The Marginal Revolution post tells a story about an FDA bureaucrat.

Key questions:
- None stated.
